Name: SQL - Change User Mode Using SMO
Description: This uses Sql Management Objects to change user access mode.  If the username and password are both empty then it will attempt a trusted connection using integrated security.

Parameters.Name: SqlUsername
Parameters.Label: Sql Username (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Account which has access to Create SQL Database

Parameters.Name: SqlPassword
Parameters.Label: Sql Password (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The password for the SQL Account

Parameters.Name: SqlDatabase
Parameters.Label: Sql Database
Parameters.HelpText: Name of Database to be created if not already there

Parameters.Name: UserAccess
Parameters.Label: User Access
Parameters.HelpText: The User Access mode to set database to

Parameters.Name: Condition
Parameters.Label: Alter Condition
Parameters.HelpText: Condition to use when calling [Alter](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms205110.aspx) method.
